snippet: Mary Rezaian, mother of Jason Rezaian, said that she was gratified to hear her son’s voice but that both knew the conversation was monitored.
lead_paragraph: Mary Rezaian, mother of Jason Rezaian, said that she was gratified to hear her son’s voice but that both knew the conversation was monitored.

headline.main: Washington Post Reporter Held in Iran Phoned Mother on Thanksgiving
